>>Weather St. Gallen

The climate is warm and temperate in St. Gallen. The precipitation levels in the city of St. Gallen are noteworthy, as there is a considerable amount of rainfall even during months that typically experience dry weather. According to Köppen and Geiger, this climate is classified as Cfb. In St. Gallen, the mean yearly temperature amounts to 7.4 °C | 45.3 °F. Each year, there is an approximate 1470 mm | 57.9 inch of precipitation that occurs.

St. Gallen is in the northern hemisphere. Its north to the equator line The onset of summer commences towards the conclusion of June and culminates by September. The months that constitute this season are referred to as June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month St. Gallen

The driest month is February, with 87 mm | 3.4 inch of rainfall. On average, the highest amount of rainfall occurs during June with a mean value of 162 mm | 6.4 inch.

average temperature by month St. Gallen

The warmest month of the year is July, with an average temperature of 16.6 °C | 61.8 °F. On average, the month of January is considered to be the coldest time of year with temperatures averaging at around -2.1 °C | 28.1 °F.

The month that sees the most relative humidity is November (72.66 %). The month with the lowest amount of relative humidity is April (72.66 %). The month with the highest amount of rainfall is May (16.00 days), whereas the one with the lowest precipitation level is February (11.77).

Hours of sunshine in St. Gallen

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

In the region of St. Gallen, it has been observed that July is the month which experiences maximum daily sunshine hours, with an average duration of approximately 10.58. The total number of sunlit hours during this period amounts to a staggering sum of about 327.85.

The location of St. Gallen experiences the least amount of daily sunshine hours during January, with an average duration of only 4.61. The total number of sunlight hours recorded in this month is equal to 142.93.

It has been estimated that the total annual sunshine duration in St. Gallen is approximately 2694.81 hours. This translates to an average monthly value of roughly 88.46 hours for each month, on a consistent basis.
